full_summary:
================================================================ +=
### Government Tender Announcement
### IT Resources for Enforcement
================================================================ +


#### Tender Details

**Contract Reference:** cb-4322-98612902
**Amendment:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 100434802
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-20
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-14T14:00:00

#### Tender Overview

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) requires IT resources to support and assist with various business application systems and security projects. On an as-and-when-requested basis, through the issuance of Task Authorizations (TAs), the CBSA will require resources for the following roles:

* 1 resource: Application / Software Architect
* 1 resource: System Analyst
* 7 resources: Technology Architect (Java)
* 3 resources: Technology Architect (Cloud Services)

These services will augment capacity in the planning and execution of departmental IM/IT initiatives managed by the Information, Science and Technology Branch (ISTB).

#### Tender Evaluation

The tender will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* ...
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Regions of Opportunity

This tender is open to bidders from the National Capital Region (NCR) in Canada.

#### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is the Canada Border Services Agency, 355 North River Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0L8, Canada.

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Nataliya Sekret at CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca.

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website at the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4322/1000434802---npp-en.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4322/1000434802---npp-amended_en_0.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4322/1000434802---npp-amended_fr
